name: The Revolt: Awakening
detailed_description:
The Revolt: Awakening is an action-platformer, allowing you to explore a city under military control… you will have to make your way. You will have to face many enemies in order to achieve your mission. Run, fight, free, repeat.

To succeed in this game you will have to find the weapons you master the most and know your enemies as well as your environment to destroy them all.

  • Strike force an intense 2D action game with the constant threat of confronting enemy forces superior in numbers.
  • Weapons & stuff: based on a loot system, collect weapons and various items at random levels and statistics to carry out your fight.
  • Craft & upgrade: improve and customize your equipment to gain power and become invincible.
  • Exploration: explore the whole city, secret rooms, hidden passages, you will have to persevere to discover everything.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (64-bit) or Newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GT 8800, AMD Radeon HD 4650
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 750, AMD R7 370
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Windows Compatible Sound card
